MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] GetMember (string name, System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] GetMember(string name, valuetype System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the member to search for.
A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify the way in which the search for members and types is conducted by the reflection operation.
Docs.summary: Searches for the specified member, using the specified binding constraints.
Docs.returns: An array of objects that represents the public members that have the specified name, if found; otherwise, an empty array.
